title: Use the 2 user-uploaded images as the default homepage and popup images

requirements.text: Add the user-uploaded image files `IMG_20260208_030749.jpg` and `image.jpg` to the frontend static assets folder `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and ensure they are included in the production build output.

quotes: I need these two images to be in the final page, 1 on the homepage and other on the popup page

acceptanceCriteria: The app loads these images via `/assets/generated/IMG_20260208_030749.jpg` and `/assets/generated/image.jpg` without going through the backend.

requirements.text: Update the homepage couple-photo default image to use the uploaded image `IMG_20260208_030749.jpg` as the initial (fallback) image shown before any user selects a different image via the homepage file picker.

quotes: I need these two images to be in the final page, 1 on the homepage and other on the popup page

acceptanceCriteria: On a fresh load (no user selection), the homepage image area shows `IMG_20260208_030749.jpg`.
The existing homepage image picker continues to work and can override the default image with a user-selected file.

requirements.text: Update the popup modal default image to use the uploaded image `image.jpg` as the initial (fallback) image shown before any user selects a different image via the modal file picker.

quotes: I need these two images to be in the final page, 1 on the homepage and other on the popup page

acceptanceCriteria: When the user clicks “Yes” to open the modal, the modal image area shows `image.jpg` by default.
The existing modal image picker continues to work and can override the default image with a user-selected file.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, and anything under `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Do not serve images from the backend; images must be referenced as static assets from `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Adding any new backend storage or upload endpoints for images.
Changing the existing Yes/No interaction behavior, modal message copy, or overall Valentine theme styling beyond what is necessary to swap the default images.
